page.title: 11OFFCHURCH, MODERN DAY LIVING
page.content: {Offchurch,}housing approximately 200 people, is described by its residents as a quiet and friendly village away from the bustle of modernisation. There is one{Public House, a Church and a{Village Hall. { }With no shops nor schools in the village, residents travel to nearby towns and larger villages, but many feel that the abundance of wildlife to be seen close by -{squirrels, badgers, {moles, foxes and muntjak deer -}makes up for lack of facilities. Social activities include{Keep Fit, {Upholstery, Tapestry, Bellringing, {Cricket}and{Football.}Recently some private gardens have been opened to the public as a fund raising venture. Some social and educational activities take place in the Village Hall while the Old School is used for country festivals.
